attributes.action: Hasten our transition to a 'privacy free' society by installing GPS implants in all new born children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One of these babies might grow up and become a terrorist one day - who needs privacy anyway?  While we are at it, let's allow full access for all government departments to the database of 'citizen locations'.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
